snippet.title: Teenager killed, possibly crushed by bull in WA's south
snippet.content: Police are investigating the death of a teenager on a farm near Esperance. It is understood the girl, who was in her late teens, was found unconscious yesterday in a paddock on a farm at Dalyup, 35 kilometres north-west of Esperance. She was rushed to hospital but died from her injuries. The ABC has been told she may have been crushed by a bull. Police say the incident may be referred to WorkSafe.
